label: 知行国
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: Province (koku) held as fief (chigyō) by a warrior. Also, in the Heian and early Kamakura periods, an entire province held in proprietorship by a ranking court noble or religious institution appointed by the civil government to serve as provincial proprietor (kokushu) of the public land.　[国、知行]
